metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for Swift, Rust, PowerShell, and SQL Server development

plugins.name: swift-developer
plugins.description: Autonomous Swift development agent for iOS/macOS apps, Swift packages, SwiftUI, and Swift 6 concurrency. Invoke with /swift-developer

plugins.name: rust-developer
plugins.description: Comprehensive Rust development assistance for building, testing, and deploying Rust applications with cargo, clippy, async patterns, and framework support. Invoke with /rust-developer

plugins.name: powershell-developer
plugins.description: Autonomous PowerShell development agent for scripts, modules, Windows Forms/WPF GUIs, and automation with Gallery verification. Invoke with /powershell-developer

plugins.name: sql-developer
plugins.description: Autonomous SQL Server development agent for T-SQL queries, stored procedures, performance tuning, and code review with Microsoft documentation verification. Invoke with /sql-developer
